Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored Belgium’s opening goal after 73 seconds.
Kevin De Bruyne scored Belgium’s second goal with 10 minutes left.
Romelu Lukaku had a goal overturned by VAR twice.
Domenico Tedesco's side demonstrated electric performance with contributions from Doku and De Bruyne.
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco expressed frustration about missed opportunities and the slow start.
Belgium's manager highlighted the team's resilience and mentality after the match.
